SYSTEM: ISSGC08.pdf: Página 34
©<Miembro Grupo>
35
Grid Middleware
• Middleware between the computational resources and the 
users (computer scientists, researchers)
• The middleware interacts with both
– User requirements
– Available resources
• Provides
– Security infrastructure, job management, data management, job 
monitoring
• Different implementations for different Grid systems
– Supercomputers, large clusters, high amount of personal computers,
speaker: SYSTEM
